summary:
Gives Miraak\'s Sword the capacity of 2 grand souls, 1 Grand Soul Gem, 1 Greater Soul Gem and Unlimited, instead of 1 petty soul gem which is the default.
It\'s in an all-in-one installer so enjoy! Easy to use and no hassle!
Planning on making the sword have the same effect on enemies as when a Lurker stomps, hits, or spits on you!
descriptionHtml:
Gives Miraak\'s Sword the capacity of 2 grand souls, 1 Grand Soul Gem, 1 Greater Soul Gem and Unlimited, instead of 1 petty soul gem which is the default.
It\'s in an all-in-one installer so enjoy! Easy to use and no hassle!
Leave recommendations of what I should do to improve the mod.
Also check out my other mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31945]JRPG Spell Names[/URL]
 **just whipped up this mod in a few minutes. Hopefully it will make you as happy as it made me :D
author: MinebyNight
